name: Stickman Sandbox [ALPHA]
description:
Welcome to Stickman Sandbox, you play as a stick figure who has godly powers! Now, how did you get these powers? By touching grass of course!

How to play:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Hold left click to move your arms around

Point your arms towards an object to pick it up.

Press E to interact with certain objects. (like guns and bombs)

Press Q to access the spawn menu.

Point the arm that has the red band to determine the spawn location of the object

; to slow down time.

Update Notes:
A bunch of bug fixes.
New pause menu.
